item.title: Performance Profiling in Rust
item.description: Puzzle 1 I was working on a puzzle from the Advent Of Code Day-5, the puzzle is as follows: You got a simple string like this one: xdaADf You need to scan this string any pair of letters that are equal but with different capitalization. In the case above we eliminate aA and we got this xdDf Then we apply the algorithm again over xdDf to reduce the word to xf by removing the dD and so on.
